rules_text:
As an additional cost to casting this spell, discard your hand.
Put each nonland card from your sideboard into your hand.
Create two treasure tokens.
notes:

Alt_1:
You may discard your hand. If you do, put that many cards from your sideboard into your hand.
Put each nonland card from your sideboard into your hand.
Create two treasure tokens.
